mapper.select: select * from lottery where userId=#{userId} order by awardId asc;

insert.selectKey: select count(*) from lottery where userId=#{userId} and awardId=#{awardId}
insert.if: update lottery set awardCount=awardCount+#{awardCount} where userId=#{userId} and awardId=#{awardId}
insert into lottery(userId, awardId, awardCount) values(#{userId}, #{awardId}, #{awardCount})
